    • Method Detail

      • handleCancel

        public void handleCancel()
        This method handles what happens when the user clicks the cancel button. Returns the user to the AppointmentView.

      • handleAccept

        public void handleAccept()
        This method handles what happens when the user clicks the accept button. First, this method checks whether the customerId and contactId entered are in the database and displays a custom exception control if they're not. It then validates the times entered for being within office hours, in the correct format, and not colliding with one another.

      • validateTime

        public String validateTime​(String timeString)
                    throws DateTimeParseException,
                           NullPointerException
        This method validates that the time is in one of the acceptable formats and returns the String in its absolute correct format.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The String in the absolute format.
        Throws:
        DateTimeParseException - DateTimeParseExceptions to be handled.
        NullPointerException - NullPointerExceptions to be handled.

      • validateOfficeHours

        public boolean validateOfficeHours​(String start,
                                   String end)
        Overloaded function that passes a default value of America/New_York to the last parameter.
        Parameters:
        start - The String of the start time.
        end - The String of the end time.
        Returns:
        The boolean result of the overloaded function call.

      • validateOfficeHours

        public boolean validateOfficeHours​(String start,
                                   String end,
                                   ZoneId officeZone)
                            throws DateTimeParseException,
                                   NullPointerException
        Validates whether the given appointment start/end times are within office hours at the given Zone.
        Parameters:
        start - The String of the start time to check.
        end - The String of the end time to check.
        officeZone - The ZoneId of the zone to check.
        Returns:
        The boolean result of if the times are in office hrs
        Throws:
        DateTimeParseException - DateTimeParseExceptions to be handled.
        NullPointerException - NullPointerExceptions to be handled.
